helper function - for color coding excel sheet columns

Source: R/table_xls_format.R
varname2color_ejam.Rd

Convert R variable name of indicator to appropriate color for header row in Excel

Usage

varname2color_ejam(varname, varnameinfo)

Arguments

varname

things like us.avg.pctlowinc

varnameinfo

must be left as default currently

Value

vector of colors

See also

varinfo() varname2vartype_ejam() varname2varcategory_ejam() vartype_cat2color_ejam()
